channel.title: [pi] [soulsplit] make it so it doesnt download cache EDIT READ PLEAS
channel.description:
how do i make it so the soulsplit client is like a normal client and you don't have to drag the file into your c:. i just want to be able to have the cache with the client files and be able to play, not having to drag the cache to your c; drive.
READ DOWN THERE
